text: The Embarrassing Beginning is the fourth full-length album by Canadian hardcore punk band Grade. It is a combination of two older releases with new packaging. The first eight songs are from Grade's first proper release, Grade/Believe split released on a small Canadian label called Workshop Records back in 1994. Tracks 11-13 come from the group's 1999 debut EP on Victory Records Triumph and Tragedy. ==Track listing== # "Cripple" # "Punk Rock Song" # "Impulse" # "Hairdie" # "Digga Digga Song" # "Classified" # "Instrumental" # "Entangled" # "Afterthought (Demo)" # "The Tension Between Stillness & Motion (Demo)" # "Triumph & Tragedy (Acoustic Version)" # "Stolen Bikes Ride Faster" # "Panama" # "A Year In The Past (Radio Version)" # "Seamless (Acoustic Version)" ==References== * Category:2000 albums Category:Victory Records albums Category:Grade (band) albums
title: The Embarrassing Beginning
